pageTitle: Itinerary for Friday, March 8, 2019 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Please be advised that due to the possibility of severe weather conditions in Nunavut, the Prime Minister’s itinerary for Iqaluit is subject to change.

Iqaluit, Nunavut

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will deliver an official apology to Inuit for the federal government’s management of tuberculosis in the Arctic from the 1940s to the 1960s, and will make an important announcement.

Frobisher Inn
Astro Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive to the Baffin Room no later than 8:30 p.m.

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Baffin Room
Frobisher Inn
Astro Hill

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 11:00 a.m.

Toronto, Ontario

4:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in an International Women’s Day roundtable with How She Hustles.

Closed to media.
